data.name: ReadObligation
data.value: select top(1) CPA_TYPE, CSP_NUMBER, OB_ID, DTY_GENERATED_ID, ORD_TYP_CD from CKT_OBLIGATION where (CPA_TYPE = 'R') and (CSP_NUMBER = @cspNumber) and (OB_ID = @obId) and (DTY_GENERATED_ID = @dtyGeneratedId)

data.name: ReadObligationPaymentSchedule
data.value: select top(1) OTY_TYPE, OBG_GENERATED_ID, OBG_CSP_NUMBER, OBG_CPA_TYPE, START_DT, END_DT, FRQ_PRD_CD, DAY_OF_WEEK, DAY_OF_MONTH_1, DAY_OF_MONTH_2, PERIOD_IND from CKT_OB_PYMNT_SCH where (OBG_CSP_NUMBER = @obgCspNumber) and (OBG_CPA_TYPE = 'R') and (OBG_GENERATED_ID = @obgGeneratedId) and (OTY_TYPE = @otyType) and (END_DT > @endDt)
